title: 20 Best Artificial Plants 2019
text:
Photo: courtesy of the retailer

While it’s easier than ever to buy live plants online, sometimes, despite our best intentions, those live plants become, well, dead plants. Artificial plants — fake plants, silk plants, faux foliage, or whatever you want to call them — offer a simple solution. They’ll never outgrow their pots, the leaves will never droop down and turn yellow, and there’s no need to worry about watering or fertilizing. They’re also pet-safe and child-safe.

Like any living plant, artificial plants can work wonders for any décor situation, and we doubt that anyone will know the difference once they’re displayed on a nice plant stand. We found some small options if you want to be subtle, like mini succulents and a potted orchid, as well as larger ones for those unafraid to go all out with a big statement ficus tree or monstera. No matter the size, an artificial plant can give you the look you’re going for without all the fuss.

Best artificial floor plants

Nearly Natural 5.5-Foot Tall Fiddle-Leaf Fig $240 (was $270, now 11% off) A 5.5 foot tall fiddle-leaf fig that’s never going to die on you. This one is pricier than some of the other faux options out there, but we’re impressed by how realistic-looking it is. Most companies seem to “overstuff” their silk fiddles with big clusters of leaves, which is a dead giveaway in our humble opinion. This one is spare and minimal, like the real deal. $240 at Amazon Buy $240 at Amazon Buy

Silk Tree Warehouse 5-Foot Artificial Bird of Paradise Plant $83 (was $159, now 48% off) Birds of paradise are one of those plants that almost look fake even when they’re real, so save yourself the trouble. This 5 foot tall faux bird of paradise —complete with irregular leaf tears and crinkles — will make just as much of a statement as a live one. $83 at Amazon Buy $83 at Amazon Buy

Terrain Faux Philodendron Rounding out the “Big Three” of status-y floor plants is, of course, the monstera. Terrain makes some of the best-looking artificial plants we’ve seen, but they’re pricey. Still, if you’ve got the money, this one is a real showstopper. $338 at Terrain Buy

Fopamtri Artificial Monstera Deliciosa Plant 43" If you want to spend a good bit less and still get a realistic-looking monstera, this is a good choice. $90 at Amazon Buy $90 at Amazon Buy

Nearly Natural Silk Ficus Tree, 6-Feet This 6 foot ficus has a delicate look, with its long and slender trunk, and the intricately detailed leaves will catch anyone’s eye. (The manufacturer’s product description says it has “1,008 individual leaves.”) $60 at Amazon Buy $60 at Amazon Buy

Nearly Natural Artificial Rubber Plant in Cylinder This is a particularly impressive imitation of the very on-trend variegated rubber tree. At 2 feet tall, its a bit smaller than the other artificial floor plants on this list, but would look perfect perched on a plant stand. $50 at Amazon Buy $50 at Amazon Buy

Nearly Natural Golden Cane Palm Silk Tree, 6.5’ Get vertical with this faux palm tree that towers more than 6 feet high. Stick with a simple planter since the tree makes a statement on its own. $91 at Amazon Buy $91 at Amazon Buy

Vickerman 6’ Japanese Maple Executive Tree Japanese maple trees typically only thrive outdoors and take years to grow. Skip all that with an elegant faux version. $120 at Walmart Buy

Nearly Natural Sansevieria Plant with Black Planter $74 (was $87, now 15% off) Snake plants are pretty hard to kill, it’s true, but that doesn’t mean it’s impossible. This looks just like the real thing, and it even comes with a modern-looking black planter. $74 at Amazon Buy $74 at Amazon Buy

Best artificial hanging plants

Nearly Natural Spider Hanging Basket Decorative Silk Plant $32 (was $42, now 24% off) The details and shading on the leaves of this hanging spider plant make it nearly indistinguishable from the real thing. $32 at Amazon Buy $32 at Amazon Buy

Vickerman 26” Silk Mini Ivy Hanging Bush It’d be very bohemian to dangle these hanging ivy leaves from a macramé planter. $26 at Walmart Buy

Nearly Natural Boston Fern in Hanging Basket $49 (was $69, now 29% off) Hang this silk Boston fern in your living room, or outdoors over your porch. $49 at Amazon Buy $49 at Amazon Buy

Nearly Natural Silk Bougainvillea Hanging Basket If you’re getting an artificial hanging plant, you might as well go for it and buy something that would be near-impossible to successfully grow indoors, like this always-blooming, bright pink bougainvillea. $50 at Amazon Buy $50 at Amazon Buy

Best artificial tabletop plants

Nearly Natural Cedar Bonsai Decorative Silk Plant 16” $50 (was $58, now 14% off) Get the bonsai look without worrying about delicate trimming and upkeep. $50 at Amazon Buy $50 at Amazon Buy

Nearly Natural Peace Lily Artificial Flower with Glossy Glass Planter Real peace lilies can be poisonous to many pets, so this silk version is a good choice for owners of curious cats and dogs. $47 at Amazon Buy $47 at Amazon Buy

Nearly Natural Agave Plant with Black Planter You unfortunately can’t use this silk agave to make tequila, but it will add a bold geometric pop to any end table. $62 at Amazon Buy $62 at Amazon Buy

Napa Home and Garden Conservatory Phalaenopsis Drop-In Silk Orchid, 23-Inches We wrote an article about how to not kill an orchid, and although it’s definitely possible to keep one alive for many years, it’s not exactly foolproof. We love the look of this silk orchid with pink blooms, and the exposed aerial roots and faux moss make it appear even more realistic. While you’ll need to supply your own pot, we like this “drop-in” style because it means you won’t be stuck with one of the cheaper-looking plasticky pots that are often attached to silk orchids. $70 at Amazon Buy $70 at Amazon Buy

Artificial succulents

MyGift 36-Inch Faux Saguaro Cactus in Cement Style Clay Pot While succulents and cacti are resilient plants and don’t need much water, they still like a lot of light. If your space is “light-challenged,” or if you’re sick of getting pricked by your cactus, a faux option like this might be a good fit. $80 at Amazon Buy $80 at Amazon Buy

Winlyn Assorted Decorative Faux Succulent Plants with Gray Pots, Set of 5 Decorate your desk with some fake succulents that won’t mind if you take an extra-long weekend. $15 at Amazon Buy $15 at Amazon Buy

And an artificial plant to keep outside

Nearly Natural Boxwood Ball Topiary $92 (was $133, now 31% off) No need to break out the pruning shears to maintain the perfectly round shape of this boxwood. Leave it outdoors by an entryway for effortless year-round greenery. $92 at Amazon Buy $92 at Amazon Buy

description: The best artificial plants include fiddle-leaf figs, rubber trees, bonsai, Japanese maple trees, agave, philodendron, hanging plants, cacti, succulents, faux orchids, peace lilies, and bird of paradise plants made from silk and plastic.
